entries.content: Starting stop button implementation. Need to create event flow for stopping Claude CLI mid-action. Reviewing contract system and UI-to-Extension event patterns from src/shared/contracts/chat.json.

Stop button naming: Chose 'chat.agent.interrupt.v1' over 'chat.agent.stop.v1' because it better conveys user action (interrupting agent mid-execution) vs passive state change. Follows pattern of user-initiated actions like chat.message.user.v1.
